headline: How Berkshire’s Growing Stake in Pool (POOL) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent days, Berkshire Hathaway has steadily increased its ownership stake in Pool Corp. to 9.3%, reinforcing the continued influence of Warren Buffett’s stock selections. This move highlights significant institutional confidence in Pool Corp., as Buffett’s investment activity is widely regarded as an endorsement of long-term business quality within the public markets.
